titleStmt.title: Christ's commission-officer: or, The preachers patent cleared, and the peoples plea considered. In a sermon preached before (and now presented to) the associated ministers of Christ, in the county of Sommerset, at the late solemn ordination at Sommerton in said county, June, 9. 1658. By John Norman ...
titleStmt.author: Norman, John, 1622-1669.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Edward Brewster, at the Crane in Paul's Church yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Dr. Williams's Library.

place.placeName: the Crane in Paul's Church yard
